spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant failure in room orientation and balcony placement. The large balcony adjacent to the living area is completely missing, while a balcony appears at the utility area in the bottom center. Window placements do not correlate with the plan's openings.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing major rooms (Master Bed Balcony) and dressing area. Wall adjacencies in the wet areas (bathrooms/toilets) are simplified or merged incorrectly compared to the technical drawing.

furniture_mapping.notes: Hallucinated furniture items were added (extra dining tables in bedrooms). Sofa arrangement in living room is roughly similar but lacks the scale and count of the original plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality isometric render with clean lighting and consistent materials. Orthographic projection is handled well despite the structural inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Missing 6'0" wide main balcony and 5'0" wide master balcony.
Hallucinated dining-style circular tables placed inside bedroom and service areas.
Incorrect placement of windows and entrance foyer door swing.
Kitchen and utility proportions are distorted, losing the defined L-shape flow.
Orientation of several beds does not match the wall-facing layout of the plan.
